resources.string: We need that permissions to send analytic to our server.
We need location permission to locate your position.
We can\'t get your location without location permission.
We need network permission to access network.
We can\'t access network without network permission.
We need write external storage permission to write your file.
We can\'t write external storage without permission.
We need read external storage permission to write your file.
We can\'t read external storage without permission.
We need SMS permission to locate your SMS.
We can\'t get your SMS without SMS permission.
Chúng tôi cần permission read external storage and location để có thể tiếp tục.
Chúng tôi không thể lấy được tất cả permission nên không thể tiếp tục.
Sorry because crashed. Chúng tôi sẽ fix sớm nhất có thể.

For security, your device is set to block installation of apps obtained from unknown sources.
%1$s %2$s (%3$d) has been downloaded and is ready to be installed.
This release was either side-loaded or downloaded using a browser in private mode.
